legislativeReference.act: Michigan Employee Earned Sick Time Act (ESTA)

accrual.description: 1 hour of sick time per 30 hours worked

waitingPeriod.description: Employer may require up to 120 calendar days of employment before use

accrual.description: 40 hours granted at start of year or employment

waitingPeriod.description: Employer may require up to 120 calendar days of employment before use

carryoverRules.description: Unused accrued time carries over to next year up to the carryover cap

largeEmployer.description: Large employers may frontload 72 hours at start of year

smallEmployer.description: Small employers may frontload 40 hours at start of year

seasonalWorkerRules.definition: Employee who works for employer less than 25 weeks in 12-month period

tenureBasedRates.description: Michigan ESTA 2025 uses flat 1:30 rate regardless of tenure
tenureBasedRates.legislativeNote: The tenure-based 1:40 rate for <5 years was removed in final law
